text:
Using a client to send 8 simultaneous HTTP requests against the server once Tomcat first starts up (using a direct connection, not going through Apache), tomcat has a NullPointer Exception.  Here's the stack trace:

text:
Works for me 3.2.2.  I regularly use JMeter to hit a serlvet from 30+ threads 
and I haven't seen this problem.  Can you still duplicate it?
